WanderingWinder wins!
Estates, Gardens, and Workshops are all gone.

cards in supply: Apprentice, Envoy, Farming Village, Gardens, Moat, Moneylender, Navigator, Secret Chamber, Tribute, and Workshop
Default card selection was used.  All players get identical starting hands.  The point tracker will be available.
----------------------

#1 WanderingWinder: 26 points (5 Gardens [34 cards] and 11 Estates); 16 turns
                 opening: Workshop / Workshop
                 [34 cards] 7 Workshops, 5 Gardens, 10 Coppers, 1 Silver, 11 Estates

#2 Obi Wan Bonogi: 15 points (3 Gardens [32 cards], a Duchy, and 3 Estates); 15 turns
                opening: Workshop / Workshop
                [32 cards] 5 Farming Villages, 3 Gardens, 3 Workshops, 2 Envoys, 1 Moat, 1 Secret Chamber, 7 Coppers, 6 Silvers, 3 Estates, 1 Duchy

----------------------

trash: nothing
